description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the S&P SmallCap 600® Capped Financials & Real Estate Index (the "underlying index").
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in common stocks of small capitalization U.S. financial service companies that comprise the underlying index. These companies are principally engaged in the business of providing financial services and products, including banking, investment services, insurance and real estate finance services.
